did.unittitle: Auburn (NY) Area Labor Council "Meeting Minutes of the Auburn (NY) Area Labor Council" and Amalgamated Meat Cutters, Butcher Workmen and Affiliated Crafts of North America on Microfilm

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Amalgamated Meat Cutters and Butcher Workmen of North America

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Auburn (N.Y.) Area Labor Council is part the New York State AFL-CIO which is a federation of 3,000 affiliated public sector, private sector, and building trades unions throughout the state, representing 2.5 million members, retirees and their families

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contents of this collection are as follows: Amalgamted Meat Cutters. Jan 5, 1950-Dec. 3, 1953 ; Auburn Area Council. Jan. 16, 1951-Dec. 6, 1988 ; Auburn Area Coucil. Jan 8, 1985-Feb. 3, 1987.
Duplicate negative copies are available upon request.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Auburn (NY) Area Labor Council "Meeting Minutes of the Auburn (NY) Area Labor Council" and Amalgamated Meat Cutters, Butcher Workmen and Affiliated Crafts of North America on Microfilm #5892 mf. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
